SmilesWriter
public class SmilesGuiWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Writes SMILES to a JTextArea.

public SmilesGuiWriter(javax.swing.JTextArea targetTextArea,
                       boolean showLibrary,
                       boolean saveAsFile,
                       boolean saveAsSDF,
                       boolean addHydrogens,
                       java.lang.String path,
                       SmiLibFrame smiFrame)
Creates a new instance of SmilesGuiWriter.

Parameters:
targetTextArea - JTextArea in which the SMILES are written
showLibrary - show library in GUI true/false
saveAsFile - save library as file true/false
saveAsSDF - save pibrary as SD file
addHydrogens - add implicit hydrogens if saving as SD file true/false
path - path/name of file
smiFrame - GUI frame
